name: OCKGridTaskView
desc: A view that displays multiple events for a single task, with each event displaying a header, grid of buttons, and a multi-line label.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: The vertical stack view that holds the main content in the view.

items.name: let headerView: OCKHeaderView
items.desc: A header view that shows a separator and an image at the end of the view.

items.name: let instructionsLabel: OCKLabel
items.desc: A multi-line label below the collection view.

items.name: let collectionView: UICollectionView
items.desc: A collection view that displays tasks in a grid.

items.name: typealias OCKGridTaskView.DefaultCellType
items.desc: The default cell type the collection view uses.

items.name: var delegate: OCKTaskViewDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles events related to changes in the task view.

items.name: static let defaultCellIdentifier: String
items.desc: The collection view registers this for the default cell identifier.
